Name: Perennial Lavender
Description: A fragrant flower used in soaps and perfumes.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una flor fragante utilizada en jabones y perfumes.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine duftende Blume, die in Seifen und Parfums verwendet wird.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une fleur parfumée utilisée dans les savons et les parfums.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Illatos virág, amelyet szappanokhoz és parfümökhöz használnak.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Un fiore profumato utilizzato in saponi e profumi.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 石鹸や香水に使われる香りのよい花。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma flor perfumada usada em sabonetes e perfumes.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Ароматный цветок, используемый в мыле и парфюмерии.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Sabun ve parfümlerde kullanılan kokulu bir çiçek.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种用于香皂和香水的芳香花。
